## Connection.disconnectInternal() method

Disconnect two blocks that are connected by this connection.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected disconnectInternal(setParent?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  setParent | boolean | _(Optional)_ Whether to set the parent of the disconnected block or not, defaults to true. If you do not set the parent, ensure that a subsequent action does, otherwise the view and model will be out of sync. |

**Returns:**

void
